name: Qasim Ghafurzai
story: Qasim was born in a small village in Afghanistan. He joined the Taliban when he was only 16 years old, but later he realized the mistake he made and joined the Afghan National Army. Eventually, he was recruited by the Iranian military and trained as an Asst. Autorifleman. Qasim is now a committed soldier, willing to do whatever it takes to protect his country and his family. He has two children, a son and a daughter.
